## SETUP
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(RJSONIO)
library(jsonlite)
```

## LOAD DATA
```{r}
load("/Users/michaelspencer/data_projects/personal_projects/venmo_public_transactions/data/all_transactions.rdata")

View(transaction_data)
```

## CLEAN DATA
```{r}
transaction_data <-
  transaction_data %>% 
  unnest(transactions) %>% 
  select(-comments, -mentions, -likes.data, -target)
```
